moviemode: 1440 x 1080 pixels (H.264), up to 30 fps; 1280 x 720 pixels (H.264), up to 60 fps; 720 x 480 pixels (D1), up to 60 fps; 352 x 240 pixels (CIF), up to 30 fps
batterylife: Up to 200 images (still), up to 90 minutes (video)
externalmemory: SD card slot (32 GB SDHC maximum)
internalmemory: 128 MB built-in memory; 90 MB for storage
speaker: Yes
whatsinthebox: A-HD+ Camcorder, lithium ion battery, AC charger cable, USB cable, component cable, A/V cable, lens cap, wrist strap, user’s guide
stillimage: 3200 x 2400 pixels (8 megapixels), 2560 x 1920 pixels (5 megapixels), 2048 x 1536 pixels (3 megapixels)
